1.content:
The two of you were walking for almost an hour.

-Are we there yet? I'm getting really tired right now Jennifer said while releasing her long blond hair from a bun.

*Almost there. I can see it from here. While you looked back you nearly stumbled at how (as always) gorgeous she looked

http://www.wallpaperfo.com/thumbnails/de...

-Watch where you're going she said with a wink.

*Yeah yeah yeah you said. And the two of you kept going until your reached the door.
*So here it is. I'dont know what's behind it but it looks like a door to me. I haven't found anything yet so maybe you can find a way to open it.

-Let me see as she walked past you examining the door.
She bend over right before you giving a good vieuw of her but.

*God damm, you thought. I hope i get lucky so i can get rid of that boner that started as soon as you saw the fabric of het yoga pants stretch.
*At least i am lucky enough to even had sex with her because she was so good looking. A part of you were disappointed that she doesn't want to settle. If you can put that women through a ring god damm you are lucky.

-Hey wat's this she said. She moved some vines and webs what reveald a button.
Pushing the button didn't do anything at first. Until some machine soundlike noise started to roar,

After some moments the old looking wooden door on the outside opened. You and Jennifer looked inside. Everthing was metal. It looked like some kind of factory. The two of you agreed to take a look inside when you spotted a large sign near the Entrance;

Ghosts In New Generalized Energy Reproduction

Jennifer started to laugh a bit.
*What?
-Take the first letter of every word.

You looked a again. G...i...n...g...e...r.....
*Serious, only you would notice that haha. Well let's keep moving. I want to see wat's more to see here.

You two kept walkin until halway splitted into two door ways. A bit nervous you didn't want to let each other alone, so you both decided to go through the:
1.title: Open the Gates

info.brief_description: What if gingers are using dead people's soul as a way of reÃ¯ncarnation.
info.description:
You are a average 20 year old man. Not to fat, not to skinny. You've brown eyes and brown hair. And your length is about 1.80m
You are in your final year of college and in the weekend earning some money with work. You are friends with bennefits with Jennifer.

Jennifer is a good looking woman of 28 years old. She the type of girl every man wants. And because of that Jennifer don't want to be in a serious relationship at all despite she is a little nymphomaniac. She is 1.70m, blue eyes and long blond hair envelloping her upper back. She doesn't work at the moment because after het school she wanted a year of to travel the country and make some fun.

You two are walking through the forest because you wanted to show Jennifer a weird door you recently found. You two are a bit of explorers and Jennifer asks if you could show her a place where maybe you two could have sex.

As for the rules:
Anything goes just avoid making small chapters.
